title: Clash Beta issues

embed.description: Hey everyone, Thank you for hanging in there with us on the first day of the Clash Beta! We saw a number of issues during the first day’s test on EUW.

body:
Hey everyone,

See Eambo's thread on Clash issues and announcements [here](https://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements-en/tAPu0EEX-clash-beta-issues-15-dec)!

Clash is currently in beta outside of NA so we don't have a lot of visibility on it.  If you have other issues, suggestions, or concerns let the developer team know directly via the[ Clash Discord ](https://discord.gg/league-clash-beta)or above thread.
